title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.35 - Permission required to start open fires in terminal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.35 - Permission required to start open fires in terminal

State Regulations

No person shall start any open fire of any type in a
truck terminal without permission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1225.35

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
